name: Frog Mansion
description:
Controls:

•   Arrow Keys or A, D and W = Move and Jump

Mobile Controls:

•   Right and Left Buttons = Move

•   Up Button = Jump

Tips:

•   You get ammo by killing Ghosts.

•   You finish the stage when you kill 140 Ghosts.

•   You can use the mouse to destroy Ghosts.

Halloween songs to listen to while playing this game: 

Thank you so much for playing my game!!
